abstract: Some HSBC Holdings clients are being investigated by the U.S. Justice Department on suspicion of failing to disclose accounts in India or Singapore, Bloomberg News reported, citing three people familiar with the matter.
snippet: Some HSBC Holdings clients are being investigated by the U.S. Justice Department on suspicion of failing to disclose accounts in India or Singapore, Bloomberg News reported, citing three people familiar with the matter.
lead_paragraph: Some HSBC Holdings clients are being investigated by the United States Justice Department on suspicion of failing to disclose accounts in India or Singapore, Bloomberg News reported, citing three people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: HSBC Clients In U.S. Tax Probe, Report Says
